name: Noh Of Hawaii Hawaiian Lemon Flavored Iced Tea Mix, 3 oz (Pack of 10)

reviews.name: Noh Of Hawaii Hawaiian Lemon Flavored Iced Tea Mix, 3 oz (Pack of 10)
reviews.reviewText:
This is by far the best ice tea mix you will find anywhere. I make a point of ordering some to be shipped to a hotel or wherever I might be staying in the US since I can't get it in Canada.

There is no powdery taste, the flavor is very clean, and it's sweet but not too sweet.

Not to mention it is all natural.

Highly recommended!
reviews.title: Great product

reviews.name: Noh Of Hawaii Hawaiian Lemon Flavored Iced Tea Mix, 3 oz (Pack of 10)
reviews.reviewText: This instant tea is so much better than any other I've had. The taste is very delicate. The convenience of 1 qt. Packets makes it easy to refill if you're the one who takes the last glass. There's no other way to describe it other than "simply delicious". We have been drinking this tea for about 3 years and just recently found that Wal-Mart offers it online. So far, I don't know of anywhere I can purchase it locally.
reviews.title: Simply delicious

reviews.name: Noh Of Hawaii Hawaiian Lemon Flavored Iced Tea Mix, 3 oz (Pack of 10)
reviews.reviewText: Very smooth tasting. It's sweet but not over sweet. I was able to add a little sugar to it if someone wanted extra sweet.
reviews.title: Delicious!
